subject: Problems with Hydraulic Dampers on throttle pedal
description_text: Hey,  i have problems with my Hydraulic damper on the throttle pedal. its jamming and is unconsisten at best. i can fully compress it without have any problems at all and it will never return to original position.     and it has a scraping sound and feeling inside when compressing.     And im worried more is going to fail if one is?     //Emanuel

conversations.body_text: Hi Emanuel Eriksson,  I've noticed that your hydraulic rod does indeed have an issue. You can remove it for now without affecting usage. We'll send you a replacement rod, don't worry.
oh thanks! that sounds great! :) will you update me with a tracking id for the package? or how iwll it be sent?
Hi Emanuel Eriksson,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047050072281
